recipe.title: Oriental Lamb Steaks
ingredients: lamb steaks cut about 1 1/2 inches thick
instructions: Marinate lamb steaks in soy sauce seasoned with chopped garlic and grated ginger. Let the meat stand in this mixture for 5 to 6 hours and turn it often. Grill as for lamb steaks , brushing with the marinade during cooking. Omit salt and pepper.
